resources.string: Send Text to any app that can send text

Floating Text Selection Toolbar
Select text to send in any app.
From the floating text selection toolbar's overflow menu, select SendText.
Select the app or contact to send the text to.
Long-press this text to try it out now!

Quick Settings Tile & Notification
To add the SendText tile to the Quick Settings Panel, fully open the notification drawer and select EDIT at the bottom.
Scroll to the bottom of the tiles list and drag the SendText tile to the top.
Tap the SendText tile to open the notification.
Paste or type the text to send in the notification.
Select the app or contact to send the text to.
This app is completely free and has no advertisements or background activities.
Clipboard contains no text to paste!
